name: PacMan (x00F)
description:
Eat all the pellets, including the power pellets which allow you to eat the ghosts chasing you! Make sure not to let the ghosts catch you! This is a recreation of Pacman by Namco.

NOTE: PC Only

Update 1.0

Controls:

Up: W / Up Arrow

Down: S / Down Arrow

Left: A / Left Arrow

Right: D / Right Arrow

Check out Zigurous and his tutorials!

Zigurous - YouTube
